column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I highly recommend seeing the Impressionist paintings first. There you will find Monet's Haystacks and Water Lilies
column2: George Seurat's A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte
column6: and many other famous paintings. If you are in a time crunch
column7: take a look at the back of the Art Institute brochure and the notable artwork will be highlighted. You should try to see those first. But I guess this is really personal preference.
